title: Pregnant Man Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Pregnant Person Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A man who is pregnant, represented with a medium-light skin tone. This emoji signifies pregnancy in men, gender inclusivity, or the anticipation of a child.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the pregnant man emoji in a medium-light skin tone is thoughtfully designed with a dignified posture and a subtly rounded abdomen, reflecting Apple's commitment to inclusive representation. The emoji benefits from Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving the figure a natural and approachable appearance with soft, rounded edges. This emoji on Apple devices offers a contemporary and evolving perspective on family and parenthood, conveying anticipation, new beginnings, or the joy of expecting a child.
